TITLE: Self-made millionaire Bethenny Frankel on why good ideas are not enough to be successful in business
SUMMARY: Bethenny Frankel, founder of SkinnyGirl, says she has always been full of good ideas, but that is never enough to be successful in business.

TITLE: Why Grammy award-winning rapper Macklemore is making clothes for the golf course
SUMMARY: Grammy award-winning rapper Macklemore is taking his newly-found passion for golf and building his own golf apparel company, Bogey Boys.

TITLE: The Fed disagrees, but Main Street says 'the recession is already here.'
SUMMARY: Confidence hits all-time low in CNBC/SurveyMonkey Small Business Survey, as weak sales outlook and inflation worry a Main Street that says recession is here.

TITLE: Why Mark Zuckerberg's other big bet, outside the metaverse, is Whatsapp for business
SUMMARY: Long-term, Mark Zuckerberg is all-in on the metaverse. But Meta is also making a big bet that Whatsapp for Business will be a huge growth driver first.

TITLE: The lesson for Main Street from the Walmart, Target inventory failures
SUMMARY: Big box retailers bet wrong on inventory and big markdowns followed as inflation and Covid changed consumer spending patterns. Main Street can do better.

TITLE: Why Mark Zuckerberg is talking so much about Meta's Whatsapp for business
SUMMARY: Long-term, Mark Zuckerberg is all-in on the metaverse. But Meta is also making a big bet that Whatsapp for Business will be a huge growth driver first.
